message: Let's be fair and end this quickly. A 60/40 split seems reasonable.
I'm sure we can find a better split that benefits us both. Let's try 60/40 with me getting the larger share this time.
Bob, this is getting us nowhere fast.  I'm willing to meet closer to the middle, but we need to close this deal before inflation eats away at the value. 55/45 is my final offer.
